rules_text: At the end of combat on each of your turns, put a charge counter on this creature. Then if there are three or more charge counters on it, sacrifice this creature and it deals 5 damage to each creature and planeswalker.
flavor_text:
[i]“It's still in an experimental phase, but... but this might be just the right time for a test run.”
—Alice Margatroid[/i]
artist: だいたいこんなかんじ/Daitai Konna Kanji
